TableData.name: 上报用户
TableData.ColumnNames: 一级用户,,.,,二级用户,,.,,三级用户

TableData.name: selectPulletFarm
TableData.Query: SELECT "PrcCode", "PrcName" FROM "SBO_AG_FARM"."OPRC" T0 JOIN ( SELECT T0."USER_CODE",T0."USERID",T2."FormId" "FarmID" ,T3."U_CostType" FROM "SBO_AG_FARM"."OUSR" T0 CROSS JOIN "SBO_AG_FARM"."OUPT" T1 INNER JOIN "SBO_AG_FARM"."UPT1" T2 ON T1."AbsId" = T2."PermId" INNER JOIN "SBO_AG_FARM"."OPRC" T3 ON T2."FormId" = T3."PrcCode" WHERE T1."FathId" = 'MTC_UFM' AND T0."SUPERUSER"='Y' UNION ALL SELECT T0."USER_CODE",T0."USERID",T2."FormId" "FarmID" , T4."U_CostType" FROM "SBO_AG_FARM"."OUSR" T0 CROSS JOIN "SBO_AG_FARM"."OUPT" T1 INNER JOIN "SBO_AG_FARM"."UPT1" T2 ON T1."AbsId" = T2."PermId" INNER JOIN "SBO_AG_FARM"."USR3" T3 ON T0."USERID" = T3."UserLink" AND T1."AbsId" = T3."PermId" AND T3."Permission"='F' JOIN "SBO_AG_FARM"."OPRC" T4 ON T2."FormId" = T4."PrcCode" WHERE T1."FathId" = 'MTC_UFM' AND T0."SUPERUSER"='N' AND T0."GROUPS"=0 ) T1 ON T0."PrcCode" = T1."FarmID" JOIN "SBO_AG_FARM"."OUSR" T2 ON T1."USERID" = T2."USERID" WHERE (T2."USER_CODE" = 'manager') AND T1."U_CostType" ='P' ORDER BY 1

TableData.name: selectBatch
TableData.Query: SELECT "PrcCode", "PrcName" FROM "SBO_AG_FARM"."OPRC" T0 WHERE ( T0."U_PulFact" = '${farmCode}') AND T0."DimCode" = 3

TableData.name: selectHouse
TableData.Query: SELECT "PrcCode", "PrcName" FROM "SBO_AG_FARM"."OPRC" T0 WHERE ( T0."U_FarmCode" = '${farmCode}') AND T0."DimCode" = 2
